DOC.brief_summary: Our study aimed to examine a possible association between Restless legs syndrome and cerebrovascular disease, by examining patients during hospitalization for acute stroke or transient ischemic attack, in a matched case-control design.
DOC.brief_title: Restless Legs Syndrome in Stroke Patients
DOC.criteria: 18 years old or older Hospitalization for stroke or transient ischemic attack 18 years old or younger No stroke or transient ischemic attack
